item.title: CVE-2024-24884|2024-02-12T08:46:54.954Z -- ari%20soft -- contact%20form%207%20connector
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ARI Soft Contact Form 7 Connector.This issue affects Contact Form 7 Connector: from n/a through 1.2.2.
